languages.text: {n}Торбальд расплывается в широкой ухмылке, и напускная суровость уходит с его лица. Он торжественно гремит:{/n} "Брат Ульфар, ты клялся, что постоишь за честь своей стаи, Зловещего воя. Сошел ли ты на Ефрат-II с братьями своими, бился ли?"

{n}Thorbald's face breaks into a wide grin, his affected severity vanishing from his face. He rumbles solemnly,{/n} "Brother Ulfar, you swore that you would stand for the honour of your pack, the Baleful Howl. Did you descend to Eufrates II with your brothers? Did you fight?"
languages.original_text: {n}Торбальд расплывается в широкой ухмылке, и напускная суровость уходит с его лица. Он торжественно гремит:{/n} "Брат Ульфар, ты клялся, что постоишь за честь своей стаи, Зловещего воя. Сошел ли ты на Ефрат-II с братьями своими, бился ли?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Thorbald's face breaks into a wide grin, his affected severity vanishing from his face. He rumbles solemnly,{/n} "Brother Ulfar, you swore that you would stand for the honour of your pack, the Famehungry. Did you descend to Eufrates II with your brothers? Did you fight?"
traits.speaker: Torbald_WarCouncil

traits.locale_text: {n}Thorbald's face breaks into a wide grin, his affected severity vanishing from his face. He rumbles solemnly,{/n} "Brother Ulfar, you swore that you would stand for the honour of your pack, the Famehungry. Did you descend to Eufrates II with your brothers? Did you fight?"
traits.speaker: Torbald_WarCouncil

traits.locale_text: {n}Thorbald's face breaks into a wide grin, his affected severity vanishing from his face. He rumbles solemnly,{/n} "Brother Ulfar, you swore that you would stand for the honour of your pack, the Famehungry. Did you descend to Eufrates II with your brothers? Did you fight?"
traits.speaker: Torbald_WarCouncil

traits.locale_text: {n}Thorbald's face breaks into a wide grin, his affected severity vanishing from his face. He rumbles solemnly,{/n} "Brother Ulfar, you swore that you would stand for the honour of your pack, the Baleful Howl. Did you descend to Eufrates II with your brothers? Did you fight?"
traits.speaker: Torbald_WarCouncil

languages.text: {n}La cara de Thorbald se convierte en una gran sonrisa y la seriedad que fingía desaparece. Con tono solemne y voz atronadora, se dirige a Ulfar.{/n} «Hermano Ulfar, juraste que defenderías el honor de tu jauría, el Aullido Torvo. ¿Descendiste a Eufrates II? ¿Luchaste?».
languages.original_text: {n}Thorbald's face breaks into a wide grin, his affected severity vanishing from his face. He rumbles solemnly,{/n} "Brother Ulfar, you swore that you would stand for the honour of your pack, the Baleful Howl. Did you descend to Eufrates II with your brothers? Did you fight?"

traits.locale_text: {n}La cara de Thorbald se convierte en una gran sonrisa y la seriedad que fingía desaparece. Con tono solemne y voz atronadora, se dirige a Ulfar.{/n} «Hermano Ulfar, juraste que defenderías el honor de tu jauría, los Hambrientos de fama. ¿Descendiste a Eufrates II? ¿Luchaste?».
traits.speaker: Torbald_WarCouncil

languages.text: {n}索巴德的脸上绽放出了灿烂的笑容，脸上的严肃荡然无存。他庄严地低吼道。{/n}“乌尔法兄弟，你曾发誓要为你的狼群‘怒嚎者’争得荣誉。你和你的兄弟们已经去过欧夫拉茨二号星了吗？你们战斗过了吗？”
languages.original_text: {n}Thorbald's face breaks into a wide grin, his affected severity vanishing from his face. He rumbles solemnly,{/n} "Brother Ulfar, you swore that you would stand for the honour of your pack, the Baleful Howl. Did you descend to Eufrates II with your brothers? Did you fight?"

traits.locale_text: {n}索巴德的脸上绽放出了灿烂的笑容，脸上的严肃荡然无存。他庄严地低吼道。{/n}“乌尔法兄弟，你曾发誓要为你的狼群‘渴名者’争得荣誉。你和你的兄弟们已经去过欧夫拉茨二号星了吗？你们战斗过了吗？”
traits.speaker: Torbald_WarCouncil

languages.text: {n}トールバルドは満面の笑みを浮かべ、その前に見せていた鋭さが消える。{/n}「ブラザー・ウルファーよ、お前は自分の群れである破滅の咆哮を守ると誓った。兄弟たちとともにユーフラテス・IIに降り立ったのか？戦ったのか？」
languages.original_text: {n}Thorbald's face breaks into a wide grin, his affected severity vanishing from his face. He rumbles solemnly,{/n} "Brother Ulfar, you swore that you would stand for the honour of your pack, the Baleful Howl. Did you descend to Eufrates II with your brothers? Did you fight?"

traits.locale_text: {n}トールバルドは満面の笑みを浮かべ、その前に見せていた鋭さが消える。{/n}「ブラザー・ウルファーよ、お前は自分の群れである破滅の咆哮を守ると誓った。兄弟たちとともにユーフラテス・IIに降り立ったのか？戦ったのか？」
traits.speaker: Torbald_WarCouncil

languages.text: {n}Un large sourire illumine le visage de Thorbald, balayant la sévérité qu'il affichait il y a un instant encore. De sa voix grave, il déclare solennellement :{/n} « Frère Ulfar, vous qui avez juré de faire honneur à votre meute, les Hurleurs sanguinaires, vous êtes-vous rendu sur Euphrate-II avec vos frères ? Avez-vous livré bataille ? »
languages.original_text: {n}Thorbald's face breaks into a wide grin, his affected severity vanishing from his face. He rumbles solemnly,{/n} "Brother Ulfar, you swore that you would stand for the honour of your pack, the Baleful Howl. Did you descend to Eufrates II with your brothers? Did you fight?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Un large sourire illumine le visage de Thorbald, balayant la sévérité qu'il affichait il y a un instant encore. De sa voix grave, il déclare solennellement :{/n} « Frère Ulfar, vous qui avez juré de faire honneur à votre meute, les nobles Dévoreurs de gloire, vous êtes-vous rendu sur Euphrate-II avec vos frères ? Avez-vous livré bataille ? »
traits.speaker: Torbald_WarCouncil

languages.text: {n}Ein Grinsen macht sich auf Thorbalds Gesicht breit und vertreibt seine affektierte Ernsthaftigkeit. Er grollt düster:{/n} "Bruder Ulfar, Ihr habt geschworen, für die Ehre Eures Rudels einzustehen, der Baleful Howl. Seid Ihr mit Euren Brüdern nach Eufrates II hinabgegangen? Habt Ihr gekämpft?"
languages.original_text: {n}Thorbald's face breaks into a wide grin, his affected severity vanishing from his face. He rumbles solemnly,{/n} "Brother Ulfar, you swore that you would stand for the honour of your pack, the Baleful Howl. Did you descend to Eufrates II with your brothers? Did you fight?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Ein Grinsen macht sich auf Thorbalds Gesicht breit und vertreibt seine affektierte Ernsthaftigkeit. Er grollt düster:{/n} "Bruder Ulfar, Ihr habt geschworen, für die Ehre Eures Rudels zu einstehen, der Famehungry. Seid Ihr mit Euren Brüdern nach Eufrates II hinabgegangen? Habt Ihr gekämpft?"
traits.speaker: Torbald_WarCouncil

languages.text: {n}Thorbald'ın yüzündeki ciddiye siliniyor, yerini geniş bir gülümseme alıyor. Ciddiyetle haykırmaya başlıyor.{/n} "Kardeş Ulfar, sürün Uğursuz Uluma'nın onuru için savaşacağına yemin etmiştin. Eufrates II'ye kardeşlerinle gittin mi? Savaştın mı?"
languages.original_text: {n}Thorbald's face breaks into a wide grin, his affected severity vanishing from his face. He rumbles solemnly,{/n} "Brother Ulfar, you swore that you would stand for the honour of your pack, the Baleful Howl. Did you descend to Eufrates II with your brothers? Did you fight?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Thorbald'ın yüzü geniş bir gülümsemeyle kaplanıyor ve yüzündeki ciddiyet siliniyor. Ciddiyetle bağırıyor:{/n} "Kardeş Ulfar, sürün Uğursuz Uluma'nın onuru için savaşacağına yemin etmiştin. Eufrates II'ye kardeşlerinle gittin mi? Savaştın mı?"
traits.speaker: Torbald_WarCouncil
